articles.title: K-pop stars BTS win big at the American Music Awards - CBC.ca
articles.description: South Korean superstars BTS were crowned artist of the year at the American Music Awards on Sunday, brushing aside challenges from Taylor Swift, Drake and The Weeknd as they took home a total of three awards.

articles.description: The group also picked up the award for favourite pop duo or group, as well as favourite pop song for Butter.
